eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.achievements

Class WauzAchievement

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.achievements.WauzAchievement

  • public class WauzAchievement
extends java.lang.Object
    An achievement, generated from the achievement config file.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    AchievementTracker
